sentences.en: For some employees, however, knowing that co - workers are romantically involved can be upsetting and of itself.
sentences.cn: 但是对于一些员工来说, 若知道同事涉入办公室恋情,这件事情本身就让人心烦.

sentences.en: He became romantically involved with a married woman.
sentences.cn: 他与一位已婚妇女产生了恋情。

sentences.en: In the romantically primed group, the men went wild with the Monopoly money.
sentences.cn: 在有着浪漫思想导向的小组里, 男性们欣喜若狂地想全部花掉这些钞票.

sentences.en: Jealousy and anger will put a damper on what could be a very good week romantically.
sentences.cn: 金牛:嫉妒和愤怒只会伤害双方的感情,让浪漫的一周蒙上阴影.

sentences.en: Jealousy and anger will put damper on what could be a very good week romantically.
sentences.cn: 嫉妒和愤怒只会伤害双方的感情,让浪漫的一周蒙上阴影.

sentences.en: Romantically, this month is anyone's guess.
sentences.cn: 浪漫这东西, 这个月可以是任何人的猜想.

sentences.en: Romantically, travel and romance will hand in hand.
sentences.cn: 在爱情方面, 旅行将和浪漫携手并进.

sentences.en: Romantically, you will be hot all month, and actually, all year.
sentences.cn: 爱情方面, 你整月都很抢手, 事实上, 整年都是.

sentences.en: Romantically, you'll be able to relax on short trips out of town.
sentences.cn: 浪漫地来说, 将能够在出城的短途旅行中得到放松.

sentences.en: She fantasized romantically about eloping with her boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 她浪漫地幻想着与她的男友一起私奔.

sentences.en: The life hustle again and always have to romantically dwell of ground.
sentences.cn: 城市再拥挤,总有浪漫的栖身之地.
他们因为爱情而联系在了一起.
我们并不是男女朋友关系。

sentences.en: When it comes to men that are romantically interested in you, it's really simple.
sentences.cn: 当男人为你着迷时, 其实逻辑很简单,忽略所有他们讲的话,只需注意他们的所作所为即可.

sentences.en: Yossariun kissed her ears and her closed eyes romantically and rubbed the backs of her thighs.
sentences.cn: 尤索林痴情地亲了亲地的耳朵和闭着的双眸,然后用手抚摸着她大腿的后部.

words.tran_cn: 传奇；浪漫史；风流韵事；冒险故事
浪漫主义者；浪漫主义艺术家
（英）有浪漫主义思想；（英）以浪漫方式进行（等于romanticize）
